name: Field of Battle
description:
Field of Battle puts you in control of your very own army. It is a strategy, RPG and RTS game where you get to recruit squads with different unit types, manage your battle strategy, and develop powerful abilities to defeat your enemies. Battle your way through the main campaign and fight in daily missions to ultimately defeat everyone before you.


FEATURES:
- Customise your own general including upgrading powerful battle and non-battle abilities
- Complete the Main Campaign and Daily Missions to receive important and specialised resources to improve your squads
- Recruit squads and level them up using experience gained in battles
- Use the best battle formations to defeat a large number of varying opponents
- Select from six distinct unit types with different specialities to develop your perfect strategy
- Use equipment to further enhance yourself and your squads

Field of Battle tests your ability to put together the best squads and develop strategies to defeat all of your enemies. It is designed so that you can play all areas of the game and complete it without the use of in-app purchases (although they can speed up your play if you wish to use them).
